_header: Listeneth lordings both elde and young
_description: A carol of the Nativity — seven quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Of a rose a louely rose / Of a rose is al myn song’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Lestenyt lordynges bothe elde & yyngeHow this rose began to
                    sprynge…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Che be our helpe & our socour& schy[l]d vs fro the
                    fyndes bond
